mapper.select: select userid, passwd, email, username, email, usernum, hp1 , hp2, hp3, addr1, addr2, user_status, gender, birth, grade, coin from ( select * from tbl_member A join TBL_MEMBER_DETAIL B on A.userid = B.fk_userid )V where user_status = 1 and userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userid, passwd, user_status) values(#{userid}, #{pwd}, default)

insert into tbl_member_detail(usernum, fk_userid, username, birth, gender, email, zipcode, addr1, addr2, hp1, hp2, hp3) values(seq_member_detail.nextval, (select userid from tbl_member where userid = #{userid}), #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email1} || '@' || #{email2}, to_number(#{zipcode}), #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{hp1}, #{hp2}, #{hp3})
mapper.select: select zipcode, sido||' '||sigungu||' '||eupmyun||' '||doro||' '||building||' '||buildname||' '||dongname||' '||riname||' '||dong2name AS address from tbl_zipcode where sido||' '||sigungu||' '||eupmyun||' '||doro||' '||building||' '||buildname||' '||dongname||' '||riname||' '||dong2name like '%' || #{sido} || '%'
mapper.update: update tbl_member set passwd = #{pwd} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member A join tbl_member_detail B on A.userid = B.fk_userid where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update tbl_member_detail set email = #{email1}||'@'||#{email2}, hp1 = #{hp1}, hp2 = #{hp2}, hp3 = #{hp3}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2} where fk_userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select actimage, joinactnum, actnum, actname, usernum, tenderday, tenderprice, actd_endday, actdnum from ( select C.actimage, to_char(A.joinactnum) AS joinactnum, to_char(A.fk_actnum) AS actnum, C.actname, to_char(A.fk_usernum) AS usernum , to_char(A.tenderday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS tenderday , A.tenderprice, to_char(B.actd_endday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS actd_endday, B.actdnum from tbl_joinaclist A join tbl_auction_detail B on A.fk_actnum = B.fk_actnum join tbl_auction C on A.fk_actnum = C.actnum where A.fk_usernum = #{usernum} )V

select actnum, actimage, actname, actd_startday, actd_endday, actdnum from ( select A.actnum, A.actimage, A.actname, B.actd_startday, B.actd_endday, B.actdnum from tbl_auction A join tbl_auction_detail B on A.actnum = B.fk_actnum where B.fk_usernum = #{usernum} )V
